thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 22 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-India Telecom Regulator Issues Directions To Rcom, Reliance Telecom Regarding Extension Of Validity Period Of UPCs

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India Telecom Regulator Issues Directions To Rcom, Reliance Telecom Regarding Extension Of Validity Period Of UPCs

organizations.name: reuters) - telecom regulatory authority of india

text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - Telecom Regulatory Authority of India:
* TRAI - ISSUES DIRECTIONS TO RCOM, RELIANCE TELECOM, ACCESS SERVICE PROVIDERS, MNP SERVICE PROVIDERS TO ALLOW PORTING OF MOBILE NUMBERS TILL MARCH 20
* TRAI - ISSUES DIRECTIONS TO RCOM, RELIANCE TELECOM, ACCESS SERVICE PROVIDERS, MNP SERVICE PROVIDERS REGARDING EXTENSION OF VALIDITY PERIOD OF UPCS Source text - bit.ly/2CAWx2g bit.ly/2CC0XpH
